item.title: Something Awaits
item.description: Camper graphic by Vecteezy! I grew up in central New Jersey. My family lived a modest middle class lifestyle and Iâ€™d never flown on a plane with my nuclear family growing up. What we did was camp. We went car camping every summer. I have fond memories up through 8th grade of those summers. When I was in the 5th grade and about 10 years old, we went on a month long car camping trip from New Jersey to California through the middle states (Illinois, North Dakota, Colorado), and then back through the southern states (Arizona, Texas, Louisiana).
